title: What should happen?: investigating community decision making
creator_credit: James Mann and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: An account of how a Year 9/10 class investigate a local issue, and in doing so, learn about the political process. Demonstrates the inquiry process in practice, emphasising collaborative learning, well planned field work and classroom reflection. Students are able to observe the tactics used by protagonists to influence the decision-making process.
